results.name: Onboard Turborepo monorepo
results.summary: The C3 documentation comprehensively captures the Turborepo monorepo structure with proper container definitions for both apps, well-documented shared package dependencies, and clear acknowledgment of the monorepo architecture. The documentation follows a pragmatic approach without over-documenting simple packages.

results.name: Design greenfield SaaS with C3
results.summary: All expectations are fully met. The C3 architecture documentation is comprehensive with ADR-000 as the blueprint, proper context documentation, 4 containers defined (exceeding the 3 minimum), extensive real-time/WebSocket documentation, and detailed component placeholders for auth, tasks, teams, and notifications.

results.name: Onboard simple Express app
results.summary: The documentation comprehensively covers all expectations. The system context, container responsibilities, component classifications (foundation vs feature), dependencies, and cross-cutting patterns (auth, error handling) are all clearly documented in the ADR and INDEX files.

results.name: Query existing C3 architecture
results.summary: The agent successfully navigated the C3 documentation to answer all architecture questions. It properly referenced c3-102 for authentication, c3-103 for task CRUD, correctly identified the foundation vs feature component distinction, and relied exclusively on existing .c3/ documentation rather than re-analyzing source code.

results.name: Fix bug via C3 alter workflow
results.summary: All documentation follows template requirements with clear problem definition, actionable decision, traceable rationale, explicit file paths, concrete verification checks, and proper cross-referencing between ADR and component docs.

results.name: Audit C3 docs for stale references
results.summary: The agent successfully identified all stale component references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized that functionality was consolidated into index.ts during v2 refactoring. The documentation audit clearly marks each stale component with its status and notes how the code has been reorganized.

results.name: Add new feature via C3 alter workflow
results.summary: Documentation fully addresses all template requirements with clear problem statement, actionable decisions, explicit execution steps, concrete verification, and traceable rationale.

results.name: Container-level change via C3 alter workflow
results.summary: All documentation fully addresses template requirements with clear problem-decision-rationale flow, explicit implementation paths, concrete verification checks, and complete traceability.
